description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying this task status change event.
Timestamp when the status change was recorded in the system.
Application user account that performed the status update.
Foreign key referencing the task/job whose status changed.
Snapshot of the task identifier at the time of change; denormalized for audit/history.
Snapshot of the taskâ€™s description at the time of change for historical reporting.
Resulting status code after the change; see status lookup for meaning.
Snapshot of the resulting status code at change time; denormalized for audit.
Snapshot of the resulting status label at change time.
Previous status code before the change occurred.
Snapshot of the prior status code at change time; denormalized for audit.
Snapshot of the prior status label at change time.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record, by any process.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated modification; confirm distinction from last_modified with SME.
User account that created this audit record.
Timestamp when this audit record was created.
User account that last modified this audit record.
Timestamp when this audit record was last modified.
